title: Adobe Premiere Pro CC 2015 (v9.1.0) RUS-ENG Update 3 by m0nkrus-
description:
[b]Year: 2015
Version: 2015.1.0 (9.1.0.174)
Developer: Adobe
By assembling: m0nkrus
Platform: Windows x64
Compatible with Seven: full
Language: English + Russian
Medicine: Present System requirements:

- Processor Intel Core 2 or AMD Phenom II; required to support 64-bit architecture
- 64-bit version of Microsoft Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8 or Windows 8.1
- 4 GB of RAM (8GB recommended)
- 4 GB of free hard disk space for installation. During installation, additional free space required
- Requires additional disk space for files, providing a preview, and other working files (10GB recommended)
- Display with a resolution of 1280x800
- Hard disk with a speed of at least 7200 rev / min (it is recommended to use some fast hard drives, preferably RAID 0)
- Sound card compatible with ASIO protocol or Microsoft Windows Driver Model
- To use QuickTime features require installation of QuickTime 7.6.6
- Optional: Adobe-certified GPU for hardware acceleration
- To access the Web service requires an Internet connection and registration Description:

Adobe Premiere Pro in 2015 - is a powerful, highly customizable editor for non-linear editing, with which you can mount the video exactly as you want it. Import and free association any video from the clip, filmed on the phone, to the raw 5K, followed by the installation, which does not need to perform transcoding. Perform video editing faster with Adobe Premiere Pro CC 2015 - the perfect tool for professional editors. Now available a variety of new features, including a built-in color correction with Adobe SpeedGrade CC 2015, extended support for the original formats, improved the function of mounting material with multiple cameras, and so on. D. Adobe Premiere Pro CC 2015 is part of the Creative Cloud. Therefore, its users access to all the latest updates, and access to new versions available from the date of their issue. Improve your skills and master new tools thanks to the large and ever-growing collection of instructional videos. Through integration with Behance can share their projects with other users and receive instant feedback on their work from designers from around the world.

What changed me: 

- From the ESD-source distribution, containing Russian and English languages, removed all other language packs.
- A number of the original files for patched installer replaced (cracked PainteR), so the opportunity to integrate the updates in the distribution.
- The distribution integrated update for Adobe Premiere Pro CC 2015 to version 9.1.0.174.
- The distribution is integrated plug that prevents the installation of spyware mandatory update for Adobe Application Manager Update to version 14.
- The distribution is integrated with the utility Adobe Update Managment Tool 8.0 (developed PainteR), which allows you to set the "cloud" update.
- In the folder Crack inside the image are a set of tools and detailed instructions to register the Adobe Premiere Pro CC 2015.
- By kutsemu installer ESD-version added a menu similar to the Box-version. It made it in the image and likeness of a similar menu for Adobe Premiere Pro CS4.
